title: Does MATLAB offer any benefits to certification? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Omkar, Pleasure to answer your query. Matlab is simulation software which is specially developed for engineers. If you get certified as Matlab certified professional (Available in Bangalore) you can expect opportunities in following fields: Electronic circuit designImage and video processingConstruction industryEmbedded Systems(As applicable)There are many others apart from those mentioned above. And thanks to governments recent initiative and investment of 2500crore in Electronics sector will boost opportunities and jobs in these sectors further. I hope the above para helps …. All the best……Take care ….God bless….
